caption.p: Immunohistochemical analysis of TNF- α. TNF- α protein expression was evaluated in different treatment groups (a–d). (a) The control group did not show any expression of TNF- α protein; (b) the DEN-treated group showed high expression of TNF- α protein; TNF- α expression was also noted in (c) rats treated with both DEN and 6-gingerol; and (d) 6-gingerol-only treated group did not shown any expression.
